channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dangerous snowstorm coming to NYC area
item.description: A major winter storm is bringing snow and ice from Minnesota to Massachusetts on Friday.

item.title: 8 killed, 18 wounded in mosque bombing in Syria
item.description: Images shared by Syria's state-run news agency showed blood on carpets, holes in the walls, shattered windows and fire damage.

item.title: Gold IRA vs. silver IRA: Which will be better for investors in 2026?
item.description: Gold and silver prices are soaring, which could bode well for both types of IRAs, but one may be the better option.

item.title: Maps show winter storm forecast for ice and snow from Great Lakes to Northeast
item.description: Millions of Americans live in areas under winter storm alerts stretching from northern Minnesota to the Eastern Seaboard.

item.title: Zelenskyy says he will meet Trump on Sunday for Ukraine-Russia talks
item.description: Ukrainian President Zelenskyy says he and President Trump have agreed to meet in Florida on Sunday, signaling progress in talks to end the Russia-Ukra...

item.title: Veterans Affairs Department reimposing near total abortion ban
item.description: The Veterans Affairs Department is reimposing a near total ban on abortions for veterans and their families that was modified in 2022.

item.title: WATCH: Hero middle schoolers help save bus driver
item.description: Surveillance video from inside a school bus shows the moment heroic students in Ashland, Ohio, helped save a bus driver in medical distress.

item.title: WATCH: Santa Claus caught speeding through streets of Ohio
item.description: Police body camera video shows Santa Claus being pulled over for speeding in Ohio, with officers reminding him that even Kris Kringle has to follow th...

item.title: WATCH: Kīlauea’s summit eruption marks 1-year anniversary
item.description: Hawaii's Kilauea volcano marked one year of continuous eruptions as Episode 39 sent lava fountains more than 1,000 feet into the air Wednesday.

item.title: WATCH: New York City subway MetroCard to be retired
item.description: The iconic card was swiped by millions daily for the past 32 years and will be retired Dec. 31.

item.title: Virtual reality opens doors for older people to build closer connections in real life
Public release of Epstein records puts Maxwell under fresh scrutiny amid her claims of innocence
item.description: British socialite and onetime Jeffrey Epstein girlfriend Ghislaine Maxwell is back in the spotlight with the public release of investigative records t...

item.title: New storm hitting waterlogged Southern California could bring mudslides and high surf
